entry.title: The Weight of Wings
entry.summary:
Author: QueenRumi21

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,485Chapters: 5/16Kudos: 92

Summary: Stiles Stilinski thought turning eighteen would mean college applications, sleepless nights, and maybe finally admitting he had a crush on one very broody Alpha werewolf. He did not expect wings. Overnight, Stiles learns the truth his father has kept hidden his whole life: he isn‚Äôt human. He‚Äôs a Nephilim‚Äîhalf-angel, half-human, dangerously powerful, and growing stronger by the day. With a pair of pure white wings and abilities he can‚Äôt control, Stiles is forced to confront a past he never knew existed‚Ä¶ and a destiny he never asked for. As the pack scrambles to understand what Stiles is becoming, Derek Hale feels something inside him stir‚Äîsomething ancient, instinctive, impossible to ignore. A connection he can‚Äôt explain. A bond he can‚Äôt run from. Secrets unravel. Powers awaken.And the weight of wings is heavier than Stiles ever imagined. Nephilim Stiles. Protective Derek. Pack feels. Slow burn Sterek.Family drama, supernatural lore, found family, and a boy learning what it means to be more than human.

entry.title: i‚Äôve got the gift of one liners
entry.summary:
Author: LyraRaineSparrow

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,160Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 10

Summary: Scott meets her first. Deaton introduces her as Ashley, the new vet assistant. She‚Äòs good with the animals. But something‚Äôs off about her. All Scott knows is that she kinda creeps him out sometimes. Stiles meets her second. Ash sticks out like a sore thumb in Beacon Hills. She looks like a walking advertisement for Hot Topic. The gentle smile and southern accent are the last things he expects. He thinks maybe Scott‚Äòs just never met an emo kid before. The sheriff meets her third. He gets a call a few days before Christmas about a strange truck that keeps parking overnight behind an apartment complex with a teenaged girl sleeping in the cab. She gives some excuse about getting in a fight with her parents and looking for a place to hide out for a few days. His gut tells him there‚Äòs more to her story, but he chooses to believe her in the moment. A few days later, he comes across Ashley‚Äòs truck again. Turns out, Ashley Lenore is an emancipated minor who travelled cross-country to get as far away from her parents as possible. And that‚Äòs how Noah ends up as the parent/guardian of two hyperactive teenagers. OR: A shameless self-insert where I fix canon my own way and try to make writing fun again.

entry.title: A Lonely Wolf Howls
entry.summary:
Author: brianRyanBio

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,181Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 17

Summary: In January of 2011 half of a woman's body is found in the Beacon Hills Preserve. As the Sheriffs department tries to find the second half of her body a series of events is set off changing the course of this small towns future and bringing together a pack of traumatized teenagers. In other words.Derek just wants to find his sisters murderer without Stiles and Scott getting in the way. Stiles wants Scott to admit he's a werewolf and to figure out what is going on. Scott wants to be a normal boy. Allison misses San Francisco and is just trying to fit in. Lydia is clinging to the top of the food chain. And Jackson wants to know where Scott is getting his juice.

entry.title: Latibule
entry.summary:
Author: Deanslefttoe

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,656Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Latibule: (noun.) A hiding place; a place or person of safety and comfort Stiles is at college, in his second year of study, trying to navigate being a broke student, being away from his home town, and being kicked out of his pack. Stiles is prepared, feeling less off balance than his previous year at college, he's excited, even, ready to get through as much as possible. And, he is almost over the guilt and shame and heartbreak that came with the whole getting kicked out of his pack thing. Yes, he still has a crush on Derek, but he has had a crush on Derek since he was 16, and now at 21, he's pretty sure he can manage. What happens when Stiles's new Folklore & Anthropology professor turns out to be Derek Hale, the one who kicked him from the pack 2 years earlier? What happens when Stiles is so utterly convinced that Derek hates him that he can't read between the lines of what the werewolf is trying to tell him? Read to find out ;)

entry.title: Fingers Crossed
entry.summary:
Author: UnknownXFuture

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 420,092Chapters: 37/40Kudos: 1,039

Summary: ‚ÄúHave you ever heard of the butterfly effect?‚Äù Stiles looked up and shook his head. ‚ÄúNo‚Ä¶ what is it?‚Äù ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the idea that the smallest of situations, can set the biggest consequences in motion. A butterfly flapping it‚Äôs wings on one side of the world, creates a hurricane on the other.‚Äù He nodded, that‚Äôs exactly how this situation sounds right now. If he and Scott never went out that fateful night and looked for that body, or if he and Derek never became friends, or hell, if he never agreed to Deatons plan in the first place‚Ä¶ then none of this would be happening. But fuck it, ‚Äòcaution‚Äô isn‚Äôt in his vocabulary. ~~~ Updates every Monday <3
